column4: anyone know how can I extrect information from a windows .exe ? my guess is that it's a SFX file actually
an SFX file is a self-extracting type of archive, I believe. You'll probably have the most success running it with Wine
: it;'s the office 2010 instlall, and It's only ONE executable file. And I getsome error, and in order to fix that error, I have to unpack the .exe and edit some files
you may have some success with cabextract then
